programme.title: Mr. Nice Guy
programme.desc: A television chef is pursued by rival gangs who think he has an incriminating videotape.

programme.title: Elvis: That's The Way It Is (Special Edition)
programme.desc: This 1970 feature-length concert film follows Elvis, as the legendary musician begins his emotional comeback.

programme.title: Deathtrap
programme.desc: Declining playwright Sidney is out of ideas - until his former student writes a mystery Sidney would kill for.

programme.title: The Killing Fields
programme.desc: Reporter Sydney Schanberg and Cambodian translator Dith Pran cover the 1975 Khmer Rouge takeover of Cambodia.

programme.title: Graffiti Bridge
programme.desc: In this spiritual sequel to Purple Rain, Prince struggles for musical control of a nightclub.

programme.title: With Honors
programme.desc: Four Harvard students befriend a homeless man and learn that many life lessons cannot be found in a book.

programme.title: 8 Seconds
programme.desc: A riveting drama about an Oklahoma boy's meteoric rise to fame as a champion bull-rider.

programme.title: The Year of Living Dangerously
programme.desc: A reporter suddenly rockets to importance after he gains access to inside information about a coup.

programme.title: Stand and Deliver
programme.desc: In this true story, a teacher inspires his East Los Angeles high school students into learning calculus.

programme.title: Over the Edge
programme.desc: Affluent middle-American suburban teenagers begin to see the flaws in their surroundings and lifestyles.

programme.title: A Prairie Home Companion
programme.desc: From director Robert Altman comes his final film, the deeply moving and comedic "A Prairie Home Companion".

programme.title: Spies Like Us
programme.desc: Two complete misfits aspire to spy for the CIA.

programme.title: Who's That Girl?
programme.desc: A woman sets off on a madcap quest to find the person guilty of the crime for which she served the time.
